Class constructor - initialize the string representation of this enum

Parameters
errorType:MediaRequestErrorType — The type of error with the Media Request
 
errorDetail:Object — Detailed information, if any, about the Error
Method detail
createFromResponse()method
public static function createFromResponse(serverResponse:Object):MediaRequestError

Given a server reponse object, if it is an error return a corresponding Media Request Error, null otherwise. If the error is unknown, return an Unknown Error.

Parameters
serverResponse:Object — the generic media api server response

Returns
MediaRequestError — if a server error, return a typed Error Object, otherwise if not an error return null
